TopicTitle: Dynamic power consumption for transmitting science

Articles.Content: Are there any mods that adjust the power consumption of science transmission based on distance from Kerbin or (in the case of RT and 1.2's CommNet) the nearest relay? It's always annoyed me that rovers and probes need so much battery power to transmit data (especially from the grav sensor thing) when there's almost always a communication satellite relay nearby that should be doing the heavy lifting.
